Speaker: Alex
Text: How did you imagine people getting past this killer plant?

Next.Speaker: Myra
Next.Text: Easy! AlphaDoom can deflect the spit with his sword!

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: And in the case he misplaced it?

Next.Speaker: Myra
Next.Text: What sort of weakling protag doesn't have a weapon?

Next.Speaker: Alex
Next.Text: I really don't know how to get past this!

Next.Speaker: Myra
Next.Text: Can you pile something in the way?
